Title: Croquembouche
Writer: Josh Thomas, Thomas Ward, Liz Doran, Hannah Gadsby (additional writing)
Actors: Josh Thomas, Debra Lawrance, David Roberts, Hannah Gadsby
Plot: Josh, Tom, and Hannah head to Arnold's to celebrate his birthday plus support him when he comes out to his family. The party guests encounter awkward conversations and situations while Alan reflects on his current life.
